vendor_name: Four Points by Sheraton Bali, Ungasan
title: Sheraton Uluwatu Escape with Jimbaran Bay Views, Couples Massage & Daily Breakfast
description:
Bask in the serene atmosphere of the Four Points by Sheraton Bali, Ungasan - perched on a lush hillside, offering panoramic views across Jimbaran Bay’s vivid blue waters and flourishing jungle landscapes that stretch far into the distance. This decadent destination in the centre of Bali's southern peninsula is home to gasp-worthy Indian Ocean views, a luminous 50-metre infinity pool on the fifth level plus a gleaming family pool and the tranquil Escape Spa where each treatment is crafted solely with your relaxation in mind. 

Allow the many marvels of the island to tempt you away from your secluded oasis with visits to see the nearby Uluwatu Temple - famed for its monkeys, or go further to explore some of the island’s most popular surf breaks, sweeping beaches and cultural wonders, with the attractions of Kuta and Seminyak accessible within 30 minutes.
location_description: Four Points by Sheraton Bali, Ungasan
offer_address: Uluwatu St Banjar Giri Dharma, Ungasan, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80364, Indonesia
